environment_variables.SLURM_SUBMIT_DIR: Directory from which the job was submitted
environment_variables.PBS_NODEFILE: File containing list of cores available to the job
environment_variables.PBS_GPUFILE: File containing list of GPUs available to the job
environment_variables.SLURM_NTASKS: Number of cores allocated to the job
environment_variables.TMPFS: File system set up in memory for this job
environment_variables.TMPDIR: Local disk (hard drive) space set up for this job
